jinngine.geometry
Interface AxisAlignedBoundingBox

All Known Subinterfaces:
Geometry
All Known Implementing Classes:
Box, ConvexSupportMap, HalfSphereSupportMap, HillClimbSupportMap, Line, Sphere
public interface AxisAlignedBoundingBox

A shape that encapsulates, or geometricaly bounds a given, usually more complex geometry. All geometries used in jinngine are required to supply an axis aligned bounding box (AABB), because it will be used when performing broad-phase collision detection

Author:
mo

Method Summary
 Vector3 getMaxBounds()
          Return a vector that contains all maximum bounds on each axis.
 Vector3 getMinBounds()
          Return a vector that contains all minimum bounds on each axis.
 

Method Detail

getMinBounds

Vector3 getMinBounds()
Return a vector that contains all minimum bounds on each axis. The bounds are in world coordinates in world space

getMaxBounds

Vector3 getMaxBounds()
Return a vector that contains all maximum bounds on each axis. The bounds are in world coordinates in world space
